entries.journal_entry_description: Tap the communications of the four major criminal groups so that you can find out who is behind the terrorist attack.
entries.journal_entry_title: Tap the Communications of the Four Major Criminal Groups
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Attack Darkwalkers at their hideout to create a diversion that will allow you to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Defeat Darkwalkers to Create a Diversion
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Place the transmitter on the Darkwalker antenna control panel. You'll find the control panel outside near the antenna.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Tap the Darkwalker Antenna Control Panel
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Next, the Skaak Tippers. Go to their compound and prepare to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Attack Skaak Tippers at their compound to create a diversion that will allow you to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task03_journal_entry_title: Defeat Skaak Tippers to Create a Diversion
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Place the transmitter on the Skaak Tipper antenna control panel. You'll find the control panel outside near the antenna.
entries.task04_journal_entry_title: Tap the Skaak Tipper Antenna Control Panel
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Next up are the Mummers. Go to their bunker and prepare to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Attack Mummers at their bunker to create a diversion that will allow you to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task06_journal_entry_title: Defeat Mummers to Create a Diversion
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Place the transmitter on the Mummer antenna control panel. You'll find the control panel outside near the antenna.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Tap the Mummer Antenna Control Panel
entries.task08_comm_message_text: Last on the list are Borvo's thugs. Go to their bunker and prepare to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Attack Borvo's thugs at their bunker to create a diversion that will allow you to tap their communication antenna.
entries.task09_journal_entry_title: Defeat Borvo's Thugs to Create a Diversion
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Place the transmitter on the Borvo antenna control panel. You'll find the control panel outside near the antenna.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Tap the Borvo Antenna Control Panel
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Now that all of the major criminal organizations have their communications tapped, report back to Sgt. Bragg to find out if he's learned anything about who led the terrorist attack. Sgt. Bragg is in the cantina in Theed.
